endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all media items managed within the service.
Add a new media item, including its content, metadata, and tags.
Update information or metadata of an existing media item.
Remove a specific media item from management.
Retrieve a list of all broadcast channels configured in the service.
Create a new broadcast channel with configuration settings.
Modify the settings or scheduling of a broadcast channel.
Remove an existing broadcast channel from the platform.
Add scheduled records linking media to specific broadcast times and channels.
Retrieve the schedule of broadcasts for all channels.
